questions.Q: The number of significant figures of 176 is:
questions.E: Non-zero digits are always significant and zeros between non-zero digits are always significant.

questions.E: Non-zero digits are always significant and zeros between non-zero digits are always significant.

questions.E: Non-zero digits are always significant and zeros between non-zero digits are always significant.

questions.E: Trailing zeros are only significant if the number contains a decimal point.

questions.Q: The number of significant figures of 90000 is:
questions.E: In an integer number, trailing zeros ($$9 \color{red}0000\color{black}$$) do no count as significant figures.
